column2: Kamea, thank you for opening your heart and sharing your story. You are more captivating and compelling than you'll ever know, I can promise you that. You are so wise and have taught me so much in what it means to keep on trekking despite unfavorable situations that may come in the way. I love you, I love you, I love you. You are beautiful, you are worthy. You are so loved. Hawai'i isn't ready!
